Reviews.Title: “Compact, well equipped room in a great location”
Reviews.Author: Mitch231
Reviews.Content: hotel close piazza san marco main attractions youre looking ritz thats clean value located id recommend hotel wife stayed locanda antico nights late december 2011 space organised essentially bedroom breakfast table inset fridge double bed main tv skylight aircon bathroom tiny modern equipped hair dryer shower head water pressure heated towel rails breakfasts simple coffee chose style coffee morning juice toasts spreads croissants etc hear couple talking using bathroom sleep quality

Reviews.Content: hotel located near san marco vallaresso vaporetto stop quiet host helpful regarding nonexisting train strike missed scheduled train bologna allowed store luggage night stay european breakfast served ensuite bathroom venice expensive night stay 175

Reviews.Title: “Amazing location!”
Reviews.Author: travelingbella
Reviews.Content: husband stayed 3 nights stay location unbelievable tucked quiet little 1 minute walk san marco piazza st marks bothered noise safe walking tofrom walking bed comfy previous 3 plenty hang clothes unpack 2 bathroom spacious clean modern website indicates front desk staffed 1pm issues staff friendly helpful spoke english breakfast typical italian breakfast croissant toast juice request caffe youd supplemented yogurt fruit bought market gem venice cant believe wonderful location

Reviews.Title: “Clean, modern,GREAT location, friendly, caring staff, but rooms a bit small.”
Reviews.Author: CAMcDonald
Reviews.Content: stayed nights 12 minutes st marks square amazing location hotel clean upkept hike flights steep stairs quiet slept furnishings modern condition limited space keeping stuff suitcases bathrooms modern shower suggest bringing own bathroom caddy 1 person fit barely bathroom time staff friendly dont speak english breakfast typical italian carbs carbs carbs wtih espresso suggest hitting local fruit market stock breakfast bed loft 6ft husband duck hit head bed comfortable consider staying planning hanging due space venice anyway

Reviews.Content: bed breakfast quiet street st marks square 1 minute walking distance nice modern beautiful bathroom clean decent size staff helpful breakfast served nice terrace simple filling coffee croissant toast hot chocolate orange juice free wifi definitely stay own apartment key arrange arrival especially 1pm staff available 1pm dario wait 2pm trouble getting bb airport
